## Track

### Event information

Size: 66 (as of FL 20.8.3)

Structure:

| Parameter         | Offset | Type |
| ----------------- | ------ | ---- |
| number            | 0      | I    |
| color             | 4      | i    |
| icon              | 8      | i    |
| enabled           | 12     | bool |
| height            | 13     | f    |
| locked_height     | 17     | f    |
| locked_to_content | 21     | bool |
| motion            | 22     | I    |
| press             | 26     | I    |
| trigger_sync      | 30     | I    |
| queued            | 34     | I    |
| tolerant          | 38     | I    |
| position_sync     | 42     | I    |
| grouped           | 46     | bool |
| locked            | 47     | bool |
